data.title: Nemetschek Group - AEC/O software specialists
data.meta_description: Providing software solutions, the Nemetschek Group is a pioneer for digital transformation in the construction industry using Open BIM.
data.text:
Providing AEC/O software solutions, the Nemetschek Group is a pioneer for digital transformation in the construction industry using Open BIM

The Nemetschek Group is a developer and vendor of AEC/O software for planners, general contractors, owners, architects, and engineers, covering the entire lifecycle of building and infrastructure projects, from the initial planning to the design, construction, and operational stages.

Founded in 1963 by Professor Georg Nemetschek, the company is a pioneer of digital transformation for the AEC/O industry. The software solutions of the group’s thirteen brands increase the quality of the construction process and improve the digital workflows of all those involved by driving collaboration and enabling a seamless flow of data and information.

The Group has a strong focus on open standards and is a key driver of OPEN BIM workflows, as underlined by its active involvement in crucial industry associations such as buildingSMART.

In addition to its market leading position in the construction industry, the portfolio also includes digital solutions for visualization, 3D modeling, and animation, used by creative minds in the media and entertainment industry.

Leveraging digital solutions

Recent studies show that the construction industry is among the least digitised industries worldwide. At the same time, the complexity of construction projects is rapidly increasing and owners and general contractors alike are facing a growing number of challenges to build on time, within budget, in line with quality requirements – and ideally, sustainably. By leveraging the Nemetschek Group’s various digital solutions, buildings can be planned, built, and operated more efficiently, sustainably, and cost-effectively.

The Nemetschek Group employs more than 3,400 experts around the globe. Organized in four customer-oriented divisions (plan & design, build & construct, manage & operate, as well as media & entertainment), the company’s AEC/O software solutions are currently used by approximately six million users worldwide.

Since its foundation over 50 years ago, the Nemetschek Group has been an advocate for seamless collaboration, connecting professions along the complete building life cycle and actively driving the creation, definition, and use of open standards (Open BIM).

Often mistakenly considered as complex, the value for owners and general contractors is obvious:

Only open standards allow for a seamless end-to-end flow of BIM data, and

Only open standards guarantee that the best companies (rather than those using the right software programs) can be employed for every single step of the project.

The unique structure of the Nemetschek Group – the Nemetschek Ecosystem – enables the thirteen highly specialised brands to continue operating independently while at the same time remaining extremely close to their respective customer groups.

As one of PBC Today’s valued stakeholders, Nemetschek Group offers sector-leading insight into the AEC/O industry.
